theBalance:ParityStrike.NAME: Loser's Retaliation
theBalance:ParityStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you lost HP last turn, deal !M! additional damage.

theBalance:BalancingAct.NAME: Sore Loser
theBalance:BalancingAct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you lost HP last turn, gain !M! Block instead.

theBalance:ImbalancedBooks.NAME: Bully the Strong
theBalance:ImbalancedBooks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has more Strength than you, double the damage.

theBalance:RiskyInvestment.NAME: Testing the Waters
theBalance:RiskyInvestment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. If it is not an Attack, lose !M! HP.

theBalance:EquivalentStrike.NAME: Overexertion
theBalance:EquivalentStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Wound into your discard pile.

theBalance:ChainReaction.NAME: Chain Slaps
theBalance:ChainReaction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain !theBalance:SM! Vulnerable.

theBalance:Collection.NAME: Kick 'em While Down
theBalance:Collection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has a Debuff, draw !M! cards.

theBalance:BadDebtRecovery.NAME: Refuse to Pay
theBalance:BadDebtRecovery.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card from your discard pile or draw pile and add it to your hand. NL Add a *Void into your draw pile.
theBalance:BadDebtRecovery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose 1 card from your discard pile or draw pile and add it to your hand. NL Add a *Void into your draw pile.

theBalance:BadDebtLoss.NAME: Self-Destruct Shame
theBalance:BadDebtLoss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Void into your draw pile.

theBalance:SpreadDamage.NAME: Share the Pain
theBalance:SpreadDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL You lose !M! HP.

theBalance:LastStrike.NAME: Bluff
theBalance:LastStrike.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! Strength.

theBalance:MirrorProjection.NAME: Mirror: Idiot Reflect
theBalance:MirrorProjection.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M!% of the enemy's intended damage.

theBalance:BankruptcyRush.NAME: Mental Breakdown
theBalance:BankruptcyRush.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Gold. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Gold is insufficient, lose !theBalance:SM! HP instead.

theBalance:DebtHarvest.NAME: Masochistic Grudge
theBalance:DebtHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each Debuff on you.

theBalance:AssetSwap.NAME: Status Reversal
theBalance:AssetSwap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Swap your Vulnerable and Weak stacks with the enemy.

theBalance:LeverageStrike.NAME: Show-off Combo
theBalance:LeverageStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Weak.

theBalance:NetWorthThrust.NAME: Growth Record
theBalance:NetWorthThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each positive Buff gained this turn.

theBalance:BalancePivot.NAME: Forced Equality
theBalance:BalancePivot.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Deal !D! damage. NL Set the enemy's Strength and Dexterity to 0 for this turn.

theBalance:BalancedTrim.NAME: Height Correction
theBalance:BalancedTrim.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL Reset both sides' Block to the average of the two.

theBalance:Doomsday.NAME: World Destruction!
theBalance:Doomsday.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL characters (including you) !M! times.

theBalance:ZeroSumJudgment.NAME: Yours is Mine
theBalance:ZeroSumJudgment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Steal all Strength from the enemy. Return it at the end of the turn.

theBalance:CapitalBlackHole.NAME: Vanity Explosion
theBalance:CapitalBlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Lose all *Pocket *Money. NL Deal !theBalance:SM! damage to ALL enemies for every !M! *Pocket *Money lost.

theBalance:InfiniteExpansion.NAME: Brat's Arrogance
theBalance:InfiniteExpansion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. NL Damage doubles each turn retained. Damage taken increased by 100%. Multiplier resets upon taking damage.

theBalance:AbsoluteNeutrality.NAME: Let's All Be Scrubs~
theBalance:AbsoluteNeutrality.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. If the enemy's HP percentage is higher than yours, reduce it to match yours (Max damage !M!).

theBalance:DevilsOption.NAME: Coquettish Loan
theBalance:DevilsOption.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL Place 2 *Dazed into your discard pile.

theBalance:Hedge.NAME: Hide Behind
theBalance:Hedge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your Block is broken this turn, the enemy gains !M! Strength.

theBalance:RiskMortgage.NAME: Overdraft Stamina
theBalance:RiskMortgage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 1 Energy next turn.

theBalance:InsuranceContract.NAME: Fraud Compensation
theBalance:InsuranceContract.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your Block is broken, gain !M! *Pocket *Money.

theBalance:InventoryClearance.NAME: Littering
theBalance:InventoryClearance.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL For each card discarded, draw 1 card and gain !M! *Pocket *Money.

theBalance:QuickFinancing.NAME: Call for Backup
theBalance:QuickFinancing.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Gain [E]. NL Add a *Slimed into your draw pile.

theBalance:WealthEqualization.NAME: We Are All Scrubs
theBalance:WealthEqualization.DESCRIPTION: Set Strength of both sides to the average value. (Rounded down)

theBalance:TemporaryPreservation.NAME: Fake Begging
theBalance:TemporaryPreservation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, the enemy gains !M! Strength.

theBalance:DuskPact.NAME: Truce Treaty
theBalance:DuskPact.DESCRIPTION: Both sides lose !M! Strength. NL Gain 2 stacks of !theBalance:SM! Plated Armor.

theBalance:TimeArbitrage.NAME: Shameless Union
theBalance:TimeArbitrage.DESCRIPTION: Depleted. Enemy skips their next 2 turns. Afterwards, your Energy becomes 0 for 2 turns.

theBalance:Fluctuation.NAME: Overheated
theBalance:Fluctuation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Double all status stacks on the field.

theBalance:MirrorShield.NAME: Mirror: Reflect Armor
theBalance:MirrorShield.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Both sides gain !M! Buffer and !theBalance:SM! Thorns.

theBalance:PhaseShift.NAME: Nyeh-Nyeh~
theBalance:PhaseShift.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Gain !M! Buffer. NL Next turn, the enemy gains 1 Buffer.

theBalance:Countercurrent.NAME: Reverse Brainwash
theBalance:Countercurrent.DESCRIPTION: Convert your negative stats into positive ones. NL Next turn, the enemy gains double that amount.

theBalance:RiskHedge.NAME: Patron's Funding
theBalance:RiskHedge.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! X Gold. NL Gain !theBalance:SM! Plated Armor for every !M! Gold lost.

theBalance:ResonanceShield.NAME: Consolation Prize
theBalance:ResonanceShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The enemy gains !M! Block.

theBalance:LiquidAssets.NAME: Spendthrift Defense
theBalance:LiquidAssets.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! *Pocket *Money: Gain !B! Block again.
theBalance:LiquidAssets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! *Pocket *Money: Gain !B! Block again.

theBalance:TemporaryImmunity.NAME: Can't Catch Me
theBalance:TemporaryImmunity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Next turn, lose HP equal to 15% of your Max HP.

theBalance:InformationAsymmetry.NAME: Look At Me!
theBalance:InformationAsymmetry.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

theBalance:Liquidation.NAME: Digging Up Dirt
theBalance:Liquidation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Remove all effects from yourself. NL For each effect removed, draw 1 card and gain [E].

theBalance:EquivalentExchange.NAME: Mystery Box
theBalance:EquivalentExchange.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Transform a card in your hand into a random Rare card of the same color. It costs 0.

theBalance:Exemption.NAME: Shameless Act
theBalance:Exemption.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Draw 1 card.

theBalance:Transfer.NAME: Expect Tomorrow
theBalance:Transfer.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Strength this turn. NL Next turn, gain !M! Energy, !M! Strength, and draw !M! additional cards.

theBalance:ZeroSumGame.NAME: Piss You Off
theBalance:ZeroSumGame.DESCRIPTION: Steal !M! Strength from the enemy. NL Return it at the end of the turn.

theBalance:PostWarReparations.NAME: Mercy Gift Pack
theBalance:PostWarReparations.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Gain !M! Regen (Does not decay). NL All enemies gain !theBalance:SM! Enrage.

theBalance:MultilayerFortress.NAME: Paid Bodyguard
theBalance:MultilayerFortress.DESCRIPTION: Lose X*!M! Gold. NL Gain X*!theBalance:SM! Plated Armor.

theBalance:EnrageMarket.NAME: Provoke Old Man
theBalance:EnrageMarket.DESCRIPTION: All enemies gain Enrage. NL Whenever an enemy gains Strength from Enrage, you gain !M! Strength.

theBalance:Quagmire.NAME: Throw a Fit
theBalance:Quagmire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Apply !M! Weak to both sides.

theBalance:MagnifyingLens.NAME: Center of Attention
theBalance:MagnifyingLens.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Next turn, the enemy gains !theBalance:SM! Strength.

theBalance:Lending.NAME: Invest in Old Man
theBalance:Lending.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Lose 30 Gold. Upon winning combat, gain !theBalance:SM! Gold. NL All enemies gain 3 Strength.

theBalance:MirrorSoul.NAME: Mirror: Copycat
theBalance:MirrorSoul.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Remove negative effects. NL Copy a specific enemy Buff to yourself.

theBalance:Ceasefire.NAME: Nobody Move!
theBalance:Ceasefire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Damage from all sources becomes 0 this turn.

theBalance:LifeLeverage.NAME: Desperate Pity
theBalance:LifeLeverage.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your missing HP.

theBalance:InfiniteOverdraft.NAME: Screw Tomorrow
theBalance:InfiniteOverdraft.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Cards cost 0 this turn. NL Skip your next turn.

theBalance:AssetReorganization.NAME: Reshuffle
theBalance:AssetReorganization.DESCRIPTION: Swap your discard pile and draw pile.

theBalance:ScaleTilt.NAME: No Stronger Than Me
theBalance:ScaleTilt.DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains !M! Strength. NL Whenever the enemy gains Strength, you gain an equal amount.

theBalance:RiskActuary.NAME: Masochist
theBalance:RiskActuary.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a negative status, gain !M! Block.

theBalance:HighInterestStorage.NAME: New Year Money Interest
theBalance:HighInterestStorage.DESCRIPTION: Unused Energy is converted into next turn's [E] and !M! *Pocket *Money.

theBalance:EnergyRecycling.NAME: Waste Recycling
theBalance:EnergyRecycling.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Exhaust card, add a random Parity Strike into your hand. It costs 0.

theBalance:BadDebtDeduction.NAME: Misfortunes Never Come Alone
theBalance:BadDebtDeduction.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, draw !M! cards.

theBalance:SymmetricalAesthetics.NAME: Bad Luck Together
theBalance:SymmetricalAesthetics.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Symmetry. NL Whenever you receive a Debuff, apply it to the enemy as well.

theBalance:HedgeFund.NAME: Learned from Pain
theBalance:HedgeFund.DESCRIPTION: Innate. If you lost HP this turn, gain [E] next turn.

theBalance:StableManagement.NAME: Good Girl Mode
theBalance:StableManagement.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. When gaining Strength, convert it to Dexterity instead. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Dexterity.

theBalance:CompoundInterest.NAME: Money Temptation
theBalance:CompoundInterest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose Gold (Spent or Stolen), gain Block equal to !M!% of the amount lost.

theBalance:MacroRegulation.NAME: Listen To Me
theBalance:MacroRegulation.DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the end of your turn, set your Strength and Dexterity to the average of the two (Rounded up).

theBalance:CapitalAccumulation.NAME: Gold Digger
theBalance:CapitalAccumulation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Gain !M! additional Gold after combat. NL For every 100 Gold you have, gain 5 less Gold.

theBalance:MirrorBarrier.NAME: Mirror: Reflect Reflect!
theBalance:MirrorBarrier.DESCRIPTION: When you take damage, the enemy takes double that amount.

theBalance:BurnBoats.NAME: Gone Bad
theBalance:BurnBoats.DESCRIPTION: You can no longer gain Block. Block gained is converted into damage to a random enemy. NL Damage increased by !M!%.

theBalance:DexToStrConvert.NAME: Pride Collapse
theBalance:DexToStrConvert.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Lose all *Dexterity. For every 1 point lost, gain !M! *Strength.

theBalance:PriceOfHubris.NAME: Soul of Hubris
theBalance:PriceOfHubris.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Gain Strength equal to !M!% of your current Gold. NL Lose 50% of your Gold.
